channel.title: Adding npc's
channel.description:
i need help... im adding a ghost npc were u log in at for the first time... i know what code 2 put but when i put this in > spawn = 1525 2660 3320 0 0 0 0 0 2 here's a pic of what it say's [img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/5563/49004585pu3.png[/img] can someone help?
side question:i have silabsoft client and my server base has none of the coord's. i was wondering how i found out were i was with my char. with out dl mopar... could any one help me? plz

it worked but… there is one problem… it’s called weird snake lol
